resources.string:
This application turns on the LED of the buttons of your phone.
 First check that the buttons can be turned on/off with the buttons (it will request ROOT, as is needed to make this).
 Then go to the Accessibility settings (or click the button down), and turn on MTKButtonLed (it will advise that it could be dangerous, but is the best way to catch notifications).
 And that's all, when you turn off the screen, the buttons will light when a new notification occurs.
On to blink, off to keep the led on until the screen is unlocked. (EXPERIMENTAL, for better results leave off)
Show only logged Apps in configuration
Update available, please download from the link that appears on the low part of the main screen.
Updated correctly. Please check that the app have ROOT permissions (by clicking the ON/OFF button), and Accessibility Service permissions.
On to disable the selected packages\' notifications, Off to only allow notifications from selected packages.
The application gets this list from loggin the notifications, so you will have to wait to receive at least one notification from each application you want to filter.
Do not notify Whatsapp group messages
It filters Whatsapp notifications with " @ ", so if you have a contact with that name will also be filtered
